roast_message: Your skin is straight fire, but let's get real, your hydration game is lacking a little bit of sauce. Your tone is looking smooth, no major complaints there, but when it comes to locking in that moisture, you're about 22% off the mark. To get that glow to the next level, I'm calling you out to slather on a hyaluronic acid serum ASAP, like, today, no excuses.
recommendations: Stay hydrated and get adequate sleep
product_suggestions: CeraVe AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30
